short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On the go, live stream TV, enjoy sports, entertainment, movies, music, science, tech, business, etc. all in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plurg – Live Stream TV & Group Chat, Anytime, Anywhere

Experience the world of live streaming with Plurg! Watch your favorite sports, entertainment, business, tech, science, and movie streams – all in just a few clicks. Whether you're catching the latest game, tuning in to breaking news, or exploring exciting entertainment, Plurg has you covered.

Plus, join our active live streams and chat in real-time with our vibrant community. Connect, discuss, and enjoy live content with others in our integrated group forum chat.

Plurg – Your gateway to live TV and real-time interaction.
